name: German Fried Camembert
author: Alois
summary: "Gebackener Camembert" (literally baked Camembert even though the cheese is breaded and fried) can be found on many German bar menus. It's a great appetizer or snack with a glass of beer. Serve with buttered toast.
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste  (Optional)
directions: Dredge in flour, then in beaten egg, and then in breadcrumbs to coat completely
Heat 1 inch oil in a small, deep saucepan over medium heat
Lower Camembert carefully into the hot oil and fry until breading is browned, 1 to 2 minutes per side
Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain
Set on a plate and season with salt and pepper
Fry parsley sprigs for 5 seconds in the hot oil
Serve on top of Camembert and garnish with cranberry sauce
